title: Mountain Summit

sentences.speaker: Sage
sentences.text: Welcome, young cultivator. You have journeyed far to reach this sacred peak.

sentences.speaker: Sage
sentences.text: The path of cultivation is long and arduous, but the view from the summit makes it all worthwhile.
The wind howls softly as you gaze upon the endless mountains below. A sense of peace washes over you.

sentences.speaker: Sage
sentences.text: Remember this feeling. It will guide you through the trials ahead.
